name: That Time I Got Reincarnated and Cursed My School
name_original: That Time I Got Reincarnated and Cursed My School
description:
An otome game about "That Time I Got Reincarnated and Cursed My School". It's pretty self-explanatory, really.

Try not to die, win the heart of your crush, ignore the pleas of your concerningly close childhood friend.

Made for Brackey's Game Jam 2023.

Controls: WASD / arrow keys to move, z to punch, x to kick, c to block.

Made by Antonio Reis, Amber Qu, Andrea Chen, Jamari Miller, and Kirnobi.
